languages.text: Все в порядке, никаких больше призраков мы не увидим. А вот Идире пришлось несладко. Направь в трюм команду зачистки и вызови ей медика. Пусть приходит в себя.

traits.locale_text: Все в порядке, никаких больше призраков мы не увидим. А вот Идире пришлось несладко. Направь в трюм команду зачистки и вызови ей медика. Пусть приходит в себя.

languages.text: "Everything is in order. We will not be seeing any more ghosts. But Idira has had a rough time of it. Send a cleanup team to the hold and call a chirurgeon for Idira. She needs time to recover."
languages.original_text: Все в порядке, никаких больше призраков мы не увидим. А вот Идире пришлось несладко. Направь в трюм команду зачистки и вызови ей медика. Пусть приходит в себя.

traits.locale_text: "Everything is in order. We will not be seeing any more ghosts. But Idira has had a rough time of it. Send a cleanup team to the hold and call a medicus for Idira. She needs time to recover."
"Everything is in order. We will not be seeing any more ghosts. But Idira has had a rough time of it. Send a cleanup team to the hold and call a medicus for Idira. She needs time to recover."
"Everything is in order. We will not be seeing any more ghosts. But Idira has had a rough time of it. Send a cleanup team to the hold and call a medicus for Idira. She needs time to recover."
"Everything is in order. We will not be seeing any more ghosts. But Idira has had a rough time of it. Send a cleanup team to the hold and call a chirurgeon for Idira. She needs time to recover."

languages.text: “一切都已经恢复正常，不过再有人看到幽灵了。不过，伊迪拉恐怕受了不少苦。派清理小组去船舱，再给伊迪拉叫个医生。她需要休息一段时间才能恢复。”
languages.original_text: "Everything is in order. We will not be seeing any more ghosts. But Idira has had a rough time of it. Send a cleanup team to the hold and call a chirurgeon for Idira. She needs time to recover."

traits.locale_text: “一切都已经恢复正常，不过再有人看到幽灵了。不过，伊迪拉恐怕受了不少苦。派清理小组去船舱，再给伊迪拉叫个医生。她需要休息一段时间才能恢复。”

languages.text: «Todo está en orden. Ya no veremos más fantasmas, pero Idira ha sufrido por ello. Envíe un equipo de limpieza a la bodega y llame a un cirujano para Idira. Necesitará tiempo para recuperarse».
languages.original_text: "Everything is in order. We will not be seeing any more ghosts. But Idira has had a rough time of it. Send a cleanup team to the hold and call a chirurgeon for Idira. She needs time to recover."

traits.locale_text: «Todo está en orden. Ya no veremos más fantasmas, pero Idira ha sufrido por ello. Envíe un equipo de limpieza a la bodega y llame a un medicus para Idira. Necesitará tiempo para recuperarse».

languages.text: 「すべて片付いた。もう亡霊を見ることはないだろう。だが、イディラはひどい目に遭っている。貨物室に清掃チームを送り、イディラのためにチラージョンを呼んでくれ。回復の時間が必要だ」
languages.original_text: "Everything is in order. We will not be seeing any more ghosts. But Idira has had a rough time of it. Send a cleanup team to the hold and call a chirurgeon for Idira. She needs time to recover."

traits.locale_text: 「すべて片付いた。もう亡霊を見ることはないだろう。だが、イディラはひどい目に遭っている。貨物室に清掃チームを送り、イディラのためにチラージョンを呼んでくれ。回復の時間が必要だ」

languages.text: "Es ist alles in Ordnung. Wir werden keine weiteren Geister sehen. Aber Idira hat einiges durchgemacht. Schickt ein Reinigungsteam in den Frachtraum und ruft einen Chirurgeum für Idira. Sie braucht Zeit, um sich zu erholen."
languages.original_text: "Everything is in order. We will not be seeing any more ghosts. But Idira has had a rough time of it. Send a cleanup team to the hold and call a chirurgeon for Idira. She needs time to recover."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist alles in Ordnung. Wir werden keine weiteren Geister sehen. Aber Idira hat einiges durchgemacht. Schickt ein Reinigungsteam in den Frachtraum und ruft einen Medicus für Idira. Sie braucht Zeit, um sich zu erholen."

languages.text: « Tout est rentré dans l'ordre. Nous ne reverrons pas de fantômes de sitôt, mais Idira a passé un sale quart d'heure. Envoyez une équipe de nettoyage dans la soute et faites venir un chirurgeon pour la prendre en charge. Elle va avoir besoin de temps pour s'en remettre. »
languages.original_text: "Everything is in order. We will not be seeing any more ghosts. But Idira has had a rough time of it. Send a cleanup team to the hold and call a chirurgeon for Idira. She needs time to recover."

traits.locale_text: « Tout est rentré dans l'ordre. Nous ne reverrons pas de fantômes de sitôt, mais Idira a passé un sale quart d'heure. Envoyez une équipe de nettoyage dans la soute et faites venir un médicus pour la prendre en charge. Elle va avoir besoin de temps pour s'en remettre. »

languages.text: "Her şey yolunda. Artık hayalet görmeyeceğiz. Yalnız İdira çok zorlandı. Ambara bir temizlik ekibi yollayın ve İdira için bir cerrah çağırın. İyileşmek için vakte ihtiyacı var."
languages.original_text: "Everything is in order. We will not be seeing any more ghosts. But Idira has had a rough time of it. Send a cleanup team to the hold and call a chirurgeon for Idira. She needs time to recover."

traits.locale_text: "Her şey yolunda. Başka hayalet görmeyeceğiz. Fakat İdira zor zamanlar atlattı. Ambara bir temizlik ekibi yollayın ve İdira için bir cerrah çağırın. İyileşmek için vakte ihtiyacı var."
